title: Alg Out 40%
long_description: ALG OUT 40% quickly destroys algae in pool water. When used as part of a weekly maintenance routine, ALG OUT 40% will also help to prevent algae growth. ALG OUT 40% treats a wide variety of algae (green, yellow and black). Its concentrated 40% formula requires less product to achieve the same results, thereby reducing its environmental impact.
short_description: BENEFIT Controls algae in pool water FORMAT 1 L

characteristics.title: Application Method
characteristics.text: Pour ALG OUT 40% directly into the water, all around the pool.

characteristics.title: Instructions
characteristics.text: Add ALG OUT 40% according to the application method. Wait 5 minutes before bathing.

dosage.specifications: Initial dosage for pool water having no visible algae is 50 mL of ALG OUT 40% per 10,000 L of pool water. Weekly maintenance (routine) dosage is 25 mL of ALG OUT 40% per 10,000 L of pool water. For visible algae, add 125 mL of ALG OUT 40% per 10,000 L of pool water.

warning: DO NOT apply the product when swimmers are in the pool.
